import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' //distructuring by using curely //braces in the function to access the product directly const Product = ({product}) => { return ( {product.name}
{product.rating} from {product.numReviews} reviews
$ {product.price} ) } export default Product
